General.Name: TCS Group Holdings Bhd
General.Description: TCS Group Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides construction services for buildings, infrastructure, civil, and structural works in Malaysia. It operates through three segments: Residential, Commercial, and Other. The company's services cover residential buildings, including terrace houses, bungalows, apartments, and condominiums; commercial buildings, such as shop offices, shopping complexes, and purpose-built buildings; and civil works comprising construction of roads, water and sewerage treatment plants, electrical substations, water tanks, and reticulation systems for townships. It also engages in the rental of properties; and provision of operation and maintenance services for solar photovoltaics systems. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jenjarom, Malaysia.
